channel.title: CVE Feed for fsheedy -- Etsy Shop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fsheedy -- Etsy Shop

item.title: CVE-2023-5470|2024-08-02T07:59:44.701Z -- fsheedy -- etsy%20shop
item.description: The Etsy Shop plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'etsy-shop' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.0.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
